After this file is finished on my connection, at the moment, ETA is 2 days, I will start a constant upload of 1500kbps for 1 day to experiment how fast people are receiving the file. I want anybody that is downloading using my upload to leave a comment with a thumbs up or thumbs down regarding the speeds. According to the results, I will either continue to upload at the rate of 1500kpbs or stop. Game on!

Upload start time will be at 2:00 AM Pacific Time Zone. I will indicate 1 day ahead before the start of the upload. Once again, the upload will be for 1 day to experiment. After that, I will continue to upload provided that the results are good from various people.
